channel.title: Editor: F. LaMond Tullis on

item.title: International Political Economy: The Story so Far and the Way Ahead
item.description: Strange, Susan. “International Political Economy: The Story so Far and the Way Ahead.” In An International Political Economy (International Political Economy Yearbook No. 1), edited by W. Ladd Hollist, F. LaMond Tullis, 13-25. Boulder: Westview Press, 1985. After noting again the essential role of economic historians in the study and understanding of the international political economy, Strange builds on an appreciation of the value of development economists, a plea for the re-inclusion of values into the study of IPE.
